meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>station</kanji> <kanji>front</kanji> is the <vocabulary>front of station</vocabulary>. This word is great for telling people where you want to meet, by the way.
readingMnemonic: This is like two separate words put together into one, so you can imagine it's the kun'yomi readings. You learned the right reading for 駅 in the kanji, and you should know the vocab word 前 by now. Combine the two together and you have yourself <vocabulary>front of station</vocabulary>.
